level¶

class level.Level[source]¶

Loads and stores level data from a TMX file.

Attributes:
  • tmx_data: tmx data
  • map_data: map data
get_map(filename)[source]¶

Simple helper function to merge the file name and the directory name.

Parameters:filename (string) – file name of TMX file
